title: Oris Big Crown ProPilot Altimeter 2014
description:
Oris Big Crown ProPilot Altimeter with Feet or Meter Scale

 Air Time - More than 75 years after Oris made its first pilot’s watch, the company is proud to announce the launch of the most innovative pilot’s watch in its history – the #Oris #BigCrown #ProPilot #Altimeter, the world’s first automatic mechanical watch with a mechanical Altimeter.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Oris Watches. Shop our full selection online, or in our store today!
